actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the special diabetes programs for Type I diabetes and Indians under that Act.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize appropriations for FY2009-FY2013 for: (1) type I diabetes research; and (2) diabetes prevention and treatment through Indian health facilities.

titles.title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the special diabetes programs for Type I diabetes and Indians under that Act.
